title: Lampoon
lyrics:
Paroles de la chanson Lampoon par Shame
I'm so needy
I'm so greedy
I'm so hungry
Won't you feed me

In my company at least i get to speak
And what is it we fear most, the things that make us weaker, the things that make us stronger, voices that begin to whisper only when we're alone (only when we're alone)

The solitude is fast
Is it with us everyday?
Does
